nodes.documentation:
@title Relayer provides two distinct features for relayers.
 * First, Relayers can opt into or out of theBitFinance liquidity incentive system.
Second, a relayer can register a delegate address.
Delegates can send matching requests on behalf of relayers.
The delegate scheme allows additional possibilities for smart contract interaction.
on behalf of the relayer.
nodes.name: Relayer

nodes.documentation: Approve an address to match orders on behalf of msg.sender
nodes.name: approveDelegate

nodes.documentation: @return true if msg.sender is allowed to match orders which belong to relayer
nodes.name: canMatchOrdersFrom

nodes.documentation:
Exit theBitFinance incentive system.
For relayers that choose to opt-out, theBitFinance Protocol
effective becomes a tokenless protocol.
nodes.name: exitIncentiveSystem

nodes.documentation: @return true if relayer is participating in theBitFinance incentive system.
nodes.name: isParticipant

devdoc.title: Relayer provides two distinct features for relayers. * First, Relayers can opt into or out of theBitFinance liquidity incentive system. Second, a relayer can register a delegate address. Delegates can send matching requests on behalf of relayers. The delegate scheme allows additional possibilities for smart contract interaction. on behalf of the relayer.
